questions.question: What is an Array?
options: A linear data structure that stores a collection of elements of the same type
A data structure that represents a hierarchical relationship between elements
A data structure that maintains a collection of elements with no specific order
A data structure that allows efficient insertion, deletion, and retrieval of elements
questions.correct_answer: A linear data structure that stores a collection of elements of the same type

questions.question: What is a Linked List?
options: A data structure that represents a hierarchical relationship between elements
A linear data structure that stores a collection of elements of the same type
A data structure that maintains a collection of elements with no specific order
A data structure that allows efficient insertion, deletion, and retrieval of elements
questions.correct_answer: A data structure that represents a hierarchical relationship between elements

questions.question: What is a Stack?
options: A data structure that represents a hierarchical relationship between elements
A linear data structure that stores a collection of elements of the same type
A data structure that maintains a collection of elements with no specific order
A data structure that follows the Last-In-First-Out (LIFO) principle
questions.correct_answer: A data structure that follows the Last-In-First-Out (LIFO) principle

questions.question: What is a Queue?
options: A data structure that represents a hierarchical relationship between elements
A linear data structure that stores a collection of elements of the same type
A data structure that maintains a collection of elements with no specific order
A data structure that follows the First-In-First-Out (FIFO) principle
questions.correct_answer: A data structure that follows the First-In-First-Out (FIFO) principle

questions.question: What is a Hash Table?
options: A data structure that represents a hierarchical relationship between elements
A linear data structure that stores a collection of elements of the same type
A data structure that maintains a collection of elements with no specific order
A data structure that uses a hash function to map keys to their associated values
questions.correct_answer: A data structure that uses a hash function to map keys to their associated values

questions.question: What is a Binary Search Tree?
options: A data structure that represents a hierarchical relationship between elements
A linear data structure that stores a collection of elements of the same type
A data structure that maintains a collection of elements with no specific order
A data structure that allows efficient search, insertion, and deletion of elements, maintaining a sorted order
questions.correct_answer: A data structure that allows efficient search, insertion, and deletion of elements, maintaining a sorted order

questions.question: What is a Graph?
options: A data structure that represents a hierarchical relationship between elements
A linear data structure that stores a collection of elements of the same type
A data structure that maintains a collection of elements with no specific order
A data structure that consists of a set of vertices and a set of edges that connect those vertices
questions.correct_answer: A data structure that consists of a set of vertices and a set of edges that connect those vertices
